requirement.topic: On subscribe you can prevent the initial message update for existing messages.

description.p: Imagine a message exists already in xmlBlaster. If you subscribe for this message you will receive an initial update for this existing message (default behavior). In some cases you want to prevent this to only receive an update when a new message is published after subscription.
If you set the subscribe QoS to
you won't receive the initial update triggered by the subscription.
